TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppSettingsExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: Retrieves values, as specified in a declarative expression, from the section of the Web.config file.

span.span: Retrieves values, as specified in a declarative expression, from the section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对中值的访问``Web.config 文件的部分。The class provides access to values in the `` section of the Web.config file. `` Web.config 文件的部分包含键/值对中的应用程序特定值。The `` section of the Web.config file contains application-specific values in key/value pairs. 应用程序值检索通过分配形式的表达式An application value is retrieved by assigning an expression of the form `<%$ AppSettings: appSettingsKey %>` 控件声明中的属性。to a property in a control declaration. 冒号 （:） 的表达式的一部分后冒号表示密钥指定的表达式被检索，而部分的类型。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression to be retrieved, and the part after the colon signifies the key. 前面的表达式将从 Web.config 文件中检索以下值。The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from the Web.config file. `` `` `` 当页分析器遇到一个具有表达式`AppSettings`前缀，它创建的实例类来处理该表达式。When the page parser encounters an expression with the `AppSettings` prefix, it creates an instance of the class to handle the expression. 如果在将编译的页面中遇到这种表达式对象生成代码，以从 Web.config 文件中检索指定的值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code to retrieve the specified value from the Web.config file. 在生成的页类执行的过程执行此代码。This code is executed during the execution of the generated page class. 如果在将未编译，页面中遇到这种表达式对象在分析和执行页时从 Web.config 文件返回的值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the Web.config file when the page is parsed and executed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检索不编译页中的应用程序设置值。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve an application settings value in a page that is not compiled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 此代码从 Web.config 文件中检索下面的表达式。This code retrieves the following expression from the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 形式的表达式时调用此方法`<%$ AppSettings: someApplicationSetting %>`时遇到的非编译页。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ AppSettings: someApplicationSetting %>` is encountered in a no-compile page. 它检索适当的值中的键/值对从``Web.config 文件的部分。It retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 此方法将替代通过调用方法替换属性作为`key`参数，属性属性作为`propertyName`参数，并且的`target`参数作为`targetType`参数。This method overrides by calling the method with the property as the `key` parameter, the property on the property as the `propertyName` parameter, and the of the `target` parameter as the `targetType` parameter.

summary.span: Returns a value from the section of the Web.config file.

span.span: Returns a value from the section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索适当的值中的键/值对从``Web.config 文件的部分。This method retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 它检索的值通过获取与作为索引键的属性。It retrieves the value by getting the property with the key as the index. 返回属于类型。The returned is of the type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索适当的值中的键/值对从``Web.config 文件的部分。This method retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 通过获取检索的值与作为索引键的属性。The value is retrieved by getting the property with the key as the index. 生成的字符串值转换为新类型基于`targetType`和`propertyName`参数。The resulting string value is converted to a new type based on the `targetType` and `propertyName` parameters.

exception.span: The key is not found in Web.config. \- or - The return value could not be converted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 CodeDOM 创建过程调用此方法为页或控件。This method is called during the CodeDOM creation for a page or control. 返回对象表示要添加到生成的页类中属性的分配的代码表达式。The returned object represents the code expression to add to the property assignment in the generated page class.

summary.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否方法已在类中实现，并可以返回表达式的值。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class and can return a value for the expression. 必须在要进行求值在未编译的页面中表达式的表达式生成器内实现。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that is not compiled. 类在以便它始终返回未编译，一页中支持的应用程序设置的评估`true`。The class supports evaluation of an application setting in a page that is not compiled, so it always returns `true`.
